INSERT INTO RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO (PK_ID,FUND_ID,INVESTOR_ID,INVE_ROLE,INVE_AMOUNT,INVE_CURRENCY,TOTAL_FINANCIAL,TOTAL_FIN_CURRENCY,STATUS,CREATE_BY,CREATE_DT,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DT,CLOSE_ROUND,ENTE_ID,CAPITAL_SOURCE,INVE_TYPE,RAISE_AMOUNT,IS_FINANCING_PLATFORM,INVE_PROPERTY,INVESTOR_NAME,INVESTOR_TYPE,RMB_INVE_AMOUNT)
( select #{item.pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.investorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inveRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.inveCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalFinancial,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.totalFinCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.closeRound,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.enteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.capitalSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.raiseAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.isFinancingPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inveProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.investorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rmbInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC} from dual)

UPDATE RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO
PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUND_ID = #{fundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTOR_ID = #{investorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVE_ROLE = #{inveRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVE_AMOUNT = #{inveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
INVE_CURRENCY = #{inveCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_FINANCIAL = #{totalFinancial,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TOTAL_FIN_CURRENCY = #{totalFinCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DT = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DT = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_ROUND = #{closeRound,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ENTE_ID = #{enteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAPITAL_SOURCE = #{capitalSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVE_TYPE = #{inveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAISE_AMOUNT = #{raiseAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IS_FINANCING_PLATFORM = #{isFinancingPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVE_PROPERTY = #{inveProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTOR_NAME = #{investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTOR_TYPE = #{investorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RMB_INVE_AMOUNT = #{rmbInveAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
RMB_INTENDED_AMOUNT = #{rmbIntendedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select aa.*,(inveAmount-bjjAoney)as shAnount from( SELECT a.REG_NAME as regName,sum(b.INVE_AMOUNT) as inveAmount ,sum(c.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) as paymentAmount,sum(decode(g.ENTE_ID,'0',b.INVE_AMOUNT,'0'))as bjjAoney from EI.RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO b inner join EI.BD_T_FUND_INFO a on a.FUND_ID = b.FUND_ID left join EI.RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_ITEM c on b.PK_ID = c.PK_ID left join EI.BD_T_INVE_INFO g on b.INVESTOR_ID = g.INVESTOR_ID WHERE b.STATUS='0' and c.STATUS='0'and g.STATUS='0' group by a.REG_NAME )aa
select B.* from EI.RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO A left join EI.RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_ITEM B on A.PK_ID = B.PK_ID
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO i where i.PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: SELECT a6.pk_id, a6.investor_id, a6.fund_id, a6.inve_amount, a6.gb, a6.total_financial, a1.fund_name FROM RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO a6 left join BD_T_FUND_INFO a1 on a1.fund_id = a6.fund_id
mapper.select: SELECT sum(INVE_AMOUNT) FROM rz_t_fund_share_info where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.*, CASE WHEN nvl(a.RMB_INVE_AMOUNT,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((a.SUM_TOTAL_FINANCIAL / a.RMB_INVE_AMOUNT) * 100, 2) END FINANCIALPROCESS from (SELECT T.*, ROUND(T.RMB_INVE_AMOUNT/( SELECT SUM(T1.RMB_INVE_AMOUNT) FROM RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN BD_T_INVE_INFO I ON T1.INVESTOR_ID = I.INVESTOR_ID WHERE T1.STATUS = '0' AND T1.FUND_ID=T.FUND_ID group by T1.FUND_ID )*100, 4 )as GB, (select sum(RMB_INVE_AMOUNT) from XJL_T_LEDGER_MAG aa where aa.ledger_Type='1' and aa.PROJ_ID=#{paramMap.projId} AND aa.OBJECT_ID=T.INVESTOR_ID group by OBJECT_ID,PROJ_ID) AS SUM_TOTAL_FINANCIAL FROM RZ_T_FUND_SHARE_INFO T LEFT JOIN BD_T_INVE_INFO I ON T.INVESTOR_ID=I.INVESTOR_ID )a
a.STATUS='0'
order by a.CREATE_DT desc
